Went here for a late lunch after a nice day of tanning at the beach per the recommendation of our AirBnB host! Eat absolutely everything you can and definitely don't skip the bombas.  I am going to go ahead and say that the bacon here was SO unbelievably delicious it nearly brought tears to my eyes.  Here is a complete list of everything you should eat (worth the wait!): artichoke heart, bomba (Fried mashed potato and ground beef), codfish fritters, calamari, shrimp , squid, morcilla (blood sausage), and pan de alioli.
